body:
# selector-list-comma-newline-before

Require a newline or disallow whitespace before the commas of selector lists.

    a
    , b { color: pink; }
/** ↑
 * The newline before this comma */

# Options

string: "always"|"always-multi-line"|"never-multi-line"

# "always"

There must always be a newline before the commas.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a, b { color: pink; }

a,
b { color: pink; }

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a
, b { color: pink; }

a
,b { color: pink; }

# "always-multi-line"

There must always be a newline before the commas in multi-line selector lists.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a,
b { color: pink; }

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a, b { color: pink; }

a
,b { color: pink; }

a
,
b { color: pink; }

# "never-multi-line"

There must never be whitespace before the commas in multi-line selector lists.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a
, b { color: pink; }

a
,
b { color: pink; }

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a,b { color: pink; }

a,
b { color: pink; }
rawBody:
# selector-list-comma-newline-before

Require a newline or disallow whitespace before the commas of selector lists.

```css
    a
    , b { color: pink; }
/** ↑
 * The newline before this comma */
```

## Options

`string`: `"always"|"always-multi-line"|"never-multi-line"`

### `"always"`

There *must always* be a newline before the commas.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
a, b { color: pink; }
```

```css
a,
b { color: pink; }
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a
, b { color: pink; }
```

```css
a
,b { color: pink; }
```

### `"always-multi-line"`

There *must always* be a newline before the commas in multi-line selector lists.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
a,
b { color: pink; }
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a, b { color: pink; }
```

```css
a
,b { color: pink; }
```

```css
a
,
b { color: pink; }
```

### `"never-multi-line"`

There *must never* be whitespace before the commas in multi-line selector lists.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
a
, b { color: pink; }
```

```css
a
,
b { color: pink; }
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a,b { color: pink; }
```

```css
a,
b { color: pink; }
```
raw:
---
title: selector-list-comma-newline-before
---

# selector-list-comma-newline-before

Require a newline or disallow whitespace before the commas of selector lists.

```css
    a
    , b { color: pink; }
/** ↑
 * The newline before this comma */
```

## Options

`string`: `"always"|"always-multi-line"|"never-multi-line"`

### `"always"`

There *must always* be a newline before the commas.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
a, b { color: pink; }
```

```css
a,
b { color: pink; }
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a
, b { color: pink; }
```

```css
a
,b { color: pink; }
```

### `"always-multi-line"`

There *must always* be a newline before the commas in multi-line selector lists.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
a,
b { color: pink; }
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a, b { color: pink; }
```

```css
a
,b { color: pink; }
```

```css
a
,
b { color: pink; }
```

### `"never-multi-line"`

There *must never* be whitespace before the commas in multi-line selector lists.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
a
, b { color: pink; }
```

```css
a
,
b { color: pink; }
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a,b { color: pink; }
```

```css
a,
b { color: pink; }
```
